title: Hi! I’m Lina.
text:
Enthusiastic about research in methodology and statistics - and bridging the gap for those who use them. Currently a master’s student at Utrecht University.
Right now, I am attempting to understand dynamic longitudinal data models and their sensitivity to measurement error.
 “To understand the world at all, sometimes you could only focus on a tiny bit of it, look very hard at what was close to hand and make it stand in for the whole;” ― Donna Tartt, The Goldfinch
